lexUnit.name: rummage.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to make a thorough but untidy search through

sentence.text: The Maggot turned in his seat and rummaged in his camera bag until he found a battered Nikon and a roll of black and white film .
Wearing a black cardigan and no make-up , she rummaged in her bag for her superstar life-saver kit -- The Dark Glasses .
Nancy rummaged in her bag for cigarettes .
Grabbing her toilet-bag and towel , she rummaged in her bag for her comb .
As I rummaged through the chest , gathering up as much as I could carry without dropping any , I found knitted scarves , blankets , gloves , socks and all sorts of garments of varying sizes .
Mitch rummaged in a drawer .
Melissa rummaged in a drawer and dragged out a timetable , glancing at the clock .
Jamie was already pulling on his trousers ; Loretta rummaged in her dressing-table drawer for clean socks to wear with an old pair of trousers .
She rummaged in her handbag for the key on its wooden key ring and tried to fit it into the lock .
She rummaged in a Gucci handbag and took out a small bottle of aspirins .
Sabrina zipped up her anorak as she stepped out into the cold night air and rummaged in her pockets for the keys to the Audi Coupe .
Ruth sighed irritably and rummaged in her pocket for a chocolate bar .
Rory rummaged in his jacket pockets .
Pushing himself with indolent grace away from the door , Rourke came into the room and began to rummage about the shelves beneath the counter .
She smacked her lips with an air of finality and rummaged for her pipe .
Mick and Paddy were rummaging in the back of the Land Rover .
Herr Nordern rummaged in his desk , brought out a half-bottle of schnapps , two glasses , and poured drinks .
He rummaged in a metal toolbox , lodged against the windscreen .
Killion rummaged through the bedside locker .
Cornelius rummaged through the contents of the boot and found them to be very oily indeed .
Rose rummaged through her skirts .
Sarah rummaged under the bed for a tin box , opened it and brought out a piece of patchwork lined with blanket .
Mademoiselle rummaged violently among the books in the desk .
He reached into his bag with one hand , and with the other pushed the radio in while he rummaged .
As Selwyn rummaged around the shed for his tools , Barney Summerville came out of the garage wiping his hands on an oily rag .
